alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:28PM EST until January 11 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. West to northwest winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga, Lake, Geauga and Ashtabula Inland counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate lake effect snow will develop Monday afternoon persisting through Monday evening, before quickly diminishing Monday night. The greatest snowfall should occur over eastern Cuyahoga County into southern Lake and northern Geauga Counties. Lower amounts of 1-3 inches of snow is expected across western Cuyahoga.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
